site_name: The Watering Hole at Monsoon Lagoon

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
During the inspection multiple containers of expired medications were found in the medication storage cabinet. When
asked if any of these medications are still being used on regulated animals the facility representative stated that expired
medications may be used for birds. The following medications were found to be expired:
• Flunazine expiration date May 2025
• Enroflox expiration date May 2025
• Enroflox expiration date September 2023
• Noromectin expiration date December 2024
• Safeguard expiration date March 2025
Medications being used past the expiration date have unknown efficacy and potency; thus, they may no longer be
efficacious for the labeled indications of use. Correct by ensuring that the facility is using the appropriate methods to
prevent and control diseases. Corrected at the time of inspection on 10 September 2025 and going forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
HEATHER COLE n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
During the inspection multiple containers of expired medications were found in the medication storage cabinet. When

• Flunazine expiration date May 2025 
• Enroflox expiration date May 2025 
• Enroflox expiration date September 2023 
• Noromectin expiration date December 2024 
• Safeguard expiration date March 2025 
Medications being used past the expiration date have unknown efficacy and potency; thus, they may no longer be 
efficacious for the labeled indications of use. Correct by ensuring that the facility is using the appropriate methods to

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
